00023 #include <Champ_implementation_sommet_base.h>
00024 #include <Domaine.h>
00025 #include <Zone_VF.h>
00026 #include <Champ_base.h>
00027 
00028 DoubleVect& Champ_implementation_sommet_base::valeur_a_elem(const DoubleVect& position, DoubleVect& result, int poly) const
00029 {
00030   const Champ_base& ch_base       = le_champ();
00031   int            nb_components = ch_base.nb_comp();
00032   const DoubleTab&  values        = ch_base.valeurs();
00033   assert(result.size() == nb_components);
00034   assert(position.size() == Objet_U::dimension);
00035   DoubleTab positions;
00036   positions = position;
00037   DoubleTab resu(1, nb_components);
00038   ArrOfInt polys(1);
00039   polys(0) = poly;
00040   value_interpolation(positions,polys,values,resu);
00041   for (int j=0; j<nb_components; j++)
00042     result(j) = resu(j, 0) ;
00043   return result;
00044 }
00045 
00046 double Champ_implementation_sommet_base::valeur_a_elem_compo(const DoubleVect& position, int poly, int ncomp) const
00047 {
00048   const Champ_base& ch_base       = le_champ();
00049   const DoubleTab&  values        = ch_base.valeurs();
00050   assert(ncomp>=0);
00051   assert(ncomp<ch_base.nb_comp());
00052   assert(position.size() == Objet_U::dimension);
00053   DoubleTab positions;
00054   positions = position;
00055   DoubleTab resu(1, 1);
00056   ArrOfInt polys(1);
00057   polys(0) = poly;
00058   value_interpolation(positions,polys,values,resu,ncomp);
00059   return resu(0, 0);
00060 }
00061 
00062 DoubleTab& Champ_implementation_sommet_base::valeur_aux_elems(const DoubleTab& positions, const IntVect& polys, DoubleTab& result) const
00063 {
00064   const Champ_base& ch_base       = le_champ();
00065   const DoubleTab&  values        = ch_base.valeurs();
00066   assert((result.dimension(0) == polys.size())||(result.dimension_tot(0) == polys.size()));
00067   assert(positions.dimension(1) == Objet_U::dimension);
00068   value_interpolation(positions,polys,values,result);
00069   return result;
00070 }
00071 
00072 DoubleVect& Champ_implementation_sommet_base::valeur_aux_elems_compo(const DoubleTab& positions, const IntVect& polys, DoubleVect& result, int ncomp) const
00073 {
00074   const Champ_base& ch_base       = le_champ();
00075   const DoubleTab&  values        = ch_base.valeurs();
00076   int nb_polys = polys.size();
00077 
00078   assert(ncomp>=0);
00079   assert(ncomp<ch_base.nb_comp());
00080   assert(result.size() == nb_polys);
00081   assert(positions.dimension(1) == Objet_U::dimension);
00082   DoubleTab resu(nb_polys, 1);
00083   value_interpolation(positions, polys, values, resu);
00084   for(int i=0; i<nb_polys; i++)
00085     result(i)=resu(i,0);
00086   return result;
00087 }

00089 DoubleTab& Champ_implementation_sommet_base::remplir_coord_noeuds(DoubleTab& positions) const
00090 {
00091   const Zone& zone = get_zone_geom();
00092   positions.resize(zone.nb_som(), Objet_U::dimension);
00093   positions = zone.domaine().les_sommets();
00094   return positions;
00095 }
00096 
00097 int Champ_implementation_sommet_base::remplir_coord_noeuds_et_polys(DoubleTab& positions, IntVect& polys) const
00098 {
00099   const Zone& zone = get_zone_geom();
00100   positions.resize(zone.nb_som(), Objet_U::dimension);
00101   positions = zone.domaine().les_sommets();
00102   zone.chercher_elements(positions,polys);
00103   return 1;
00104 }
00105 
00106 DoubleTab& Champ_implementation_sommet_base::valeur_aux_sommets_impl(DoubleTab& result) const
00107 {
00108   const Champ_base& ch_base = le_champ();
00109   const DoubleTab&  values = ch_base.valeurs();
00110   const int size = values.dimension(0), N = values.line_size();
00111 
00112   assert((result.dimension(0) == size) || (result.dimension_tot(0) == size));
00113   assert(result.line_size() == N);
00114   for (int i = 0; i < size; i++)
00115     for (int n = 0; n < N; n++)
00116       result(i, n) = values(i, n);
00117 
00118   return result;
00119 }
00120 
00121 DoubleVect& Champ_implementation_sommet_base::valeur_aux_sommets_compo_impl(DoubleVect& result, int ncomp) const
00122 {
00123   const Champ_base& ch_base       = le_champ();
00124   const DoubleTab&  values        = ch_base.valeurs();
00125   int            size          = values.dimension(0);
00126 
00127   assert(ncomp>=0);
00128   assert(ncomp < ch_base.nb_comp());
00129   assert(result.size() == size);
00130   assert(values.nb_dim() == 2);
00131   assert(values.dimension(1) == ch_base.nb_comp());
00132 
00133   for (int i=0; i<size; i++)
00134     result(i) = values(i, ncomp);
00135 
00136   return result;
00137 }
